backend/main.mo: Defines resident care data types and comparison utilities, and initializes authorization and storage mixins in the main actor.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report placeholder with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of all major frontend files for reference or tooling.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_VERSION_89.md: Deployment and smoke‑test checklist for Version 89, emphasizing no‑change publish‑only deployment requirements.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining OKLCH design tokens for light and dark themes and global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React application root and main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application logic handling authentication, actor initialization, profile setup, and TanStack Router configuration.
frontend/src/components/AddAdlRecordDial: Dialog component for creating ADL records with form fields, validation, and mutation submission.
frontend/src/components/AddDailyVitalsDi: Dialog component for entering and submitting daily vital signs for a resident using a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/AddMarRecordDial: Dialog for adding a medication administration record, selecting active medications and submitting administration details.
frontend/src/components/AddMedicationDia: Form dialog to create a new medication for a resident, including dosage, route, times, and prescribing physician.
frontend/src/components/AddResidentDialo: Large dialog for creating a new resident with personal details, contacts, physicians, insurance, and medications.
frontend/src/components/AddWeightEntryDi: Dialog for adding a resident’s weight measurement with unit selection and notes.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Displays a brand logo image with size and mode options and a text fallback on load error.
frontend/src/components/EditMedicationDi: Dialog component that loads medication data into a form, allows editing fields, and submits updates via useEditMedication.
frontend/src/components/EditResidentDial: Large resident-editing form that populates from a Resident object and submits updates using useUpdateResident.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Simple profile setup form collecting name, role, and employee ID and saving them via useSaveCallerUserProfile.
frontend/src/components/ResidentPhotoUpl: Empty placeholder component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/StartupErrorScre: Displays startup errors with diagnostics, retry, and logout options, using Internet Identity and react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context with login, logout, identity persistence, and status handling via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, authorization status, and resident data from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useResilientActor.ts: Creates and manages a resilient backend actor with timeout handling, optional admin initialization, and React Query integration.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS layers, theme variables, dialog overrides, and print-specific styling for consistent UI rendering.
frontend/src/lib/actorInit.ts: Offers utilities for actor initialization including timeout wrapping, error normalization, and categorization of non-fatal and authorization errors.
frontend/src/lib/assetUrl.ts: Builds normalized asset URLs using Vite's base path while preventing double slashes.
frontend/src/lib/dateUtils.ts: Implements date conversion utilities between strings and nanoseconds, plus formatting and age calculation without timezone issues.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, setting up QueryClient, Internet Identity provider, and global styles before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the main dashboard with resident lists, filters, sorting, admin actions, and dialogs using various backend query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the login screen with a branded card and a button that triggers Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentProfile.tsx: Displays a resident’s detailed profile with data fetching, dialogs for editing and adding records, and validation of the resident ID.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from the URL or hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, shadows, breakpoints, and animations for the app’s UI theme.
project_state.json: Contains the project’s state, architectural notes, and known issues for the Moritz Care Home system.
